tool.name: Chado load trees
tool.command:
#if $input.input_type == "archive": mkdir 'newick_arch/' && tar -C 'newick_arch/' -xzvf '${input.newick_arch}' > /dev/null && #end if
@AUTH@
chakin phylogeny load_tree
$match_on_name
#if $prefix: --prefix '$prefix' #end if
#if $xref_db: --xref_db '$xref_db' #end if
#if $input.input_type == "file": #if $name: --name '$name' #end if
#if $xref_accession: --xref_accession '$xref_accession' #end if
'$newick' #else 'newick_arch/' #end if
'$analysis_id' > '$results'

param.name: name
param.label: Name
param.help: The name given to the phylotree entry in the database

param.name: xref_accession
param.label: Xref Accession
param.help: The accession to use for dbxrefs for the trees (assumed same as name unless otherwise specified)

param.name: newick_arch
param.label: Newicks archive
param.help: Archive of Newick files to load (must be at the root of the archive)

param.name: xref_db
param.label: Xref db
param.help: The name of the db to link dbxrefs for the trees

param.name: match_on_name
param.label: Match On Name
param.help: Match polypeptide features using their name instead of their uniquename

param.name: prefix
param.label: Prefix
param.help: Comma-separated list of prefix to be removed from identifiers (e.g species prefixes when loading OrthoFinder output)

tool.help:
Load a phylogenetic tree (Newick format) into Chado db
@HELP@
